name: Watto's Matto (alpha build)
description:
In a galaxy far far away, on the planet of Tatooine, the gambler Sebulba has stolen precious cargo. Grogizmo and Goo have been stolen and Watto must get them back by any means necessary!
Based on characters and jokes from the incredible George Lucas Talk Show!

Controls:
JUMP = Space Bar or Mouse Click

Playable Characters: Watto, Green Watto

Future updates will include new characters, enemies, and levels!!!
